Header: A suspect is arrested for killing police constables
Content: Kilinochchi Police have arrested a suspect in connection with the killing of two police officers at Wawnathieve in Batticaloe. Police said the 48 year old suspect is a resident of Wattakachchi area in Kilinochchi. The suspect is expected to be handed over to the CID Officers who are conducting investigations into the shooting. A group of officials including the IGP left for the area yesterday to look into the investigations into the incident. The bodies of the two constables were found recently near the Wawnathieve Road Block.
